typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		county_code as string,
		county_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		CountryCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SRDimCounty
SRDimCounty sink(input(
		County_Key as integer,
		County_Code as string,
		County_Name as string,
		State_Code as string,
		Country_Code as string,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		UpdationDate as timestamp,
		RecordCreationUserID as integer,
		RecordUpdationUserID as integer,
		ph_varchar1 as string,
		ph_varchar2 as string,
		ph_Decimal1 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_Decimal2 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_datetime1 as timestamp,
		ph_datetime2 as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		County_Code = county_code,
		County_Name = county_name,
		State_Code = state_code,
		Country_Code = CountryCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TRDimCounty
